Action.author: stevetolman
Action.body: This will also require a change to the code. Do not make this change without further discussion with engineering.

Action.author: techwritingwhiz
Action.body: ~SeanBohan_Sovrin I'm going to say "no" because this is something that does need to be fixed. It just hasn't been a priority. We can close this ticket if we can track it somewhere else. Not resolving this could potentially incur negative legal scenarios in the future. When I realized this, I was instructed to create a ticket for this item.
